quest_desc.qkname: Everything According to the Goddess's Will

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(It seems you got out safely.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
...
<html>$Everything According to the Goddess's Will$</html>

$Velskud$
...

$Velskud$
I sent them all back.

${user_nick}$
What a relief! I was worried they would never find a way out of the Old Saint Haven. The Goddess's dream may appear in many places like this, but I wonder why we were the only ones caught up in it. Perhaps this is all the will of the Goddess. I was so worried I would never see Eltia again!

$Velskud$
...

${user_nick}$
The surprising thing is that they all were people who recognized the changes in Saint Haven. Yet for some reason King Cassius wasn't among them. What in world could have… Velskud?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Th-this is freaky. The air is suffocating!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(He's serious. He's really going to attack me!!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
If it weren't for the mission, I'd have cut off bothersome bits like you and destroyed this world.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(I best not let my guard down… Huh?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Go back. You don't know what's going to happen in the days to come. Whatever happens, it'll be huge. Something on this scale.

$Velskud$
You might get swept away again if you remain here longer. Go back.
You will slowly forget about it anyway. That's how dreams within a dream work.

$Velskud$
You might get swept away again if you remain here longer. Go back.
You will slowly forget about it anyway. That's how dreams within a dream work

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Velskud said that all this happened because the Goddess's dream changed.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$ Priestess of Darkness Shea${action:Talk}
Did you have a good trip? It's been a mess on this side. There's a lot going on between the fissures in the fabric of space and the vibrations.

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
In the end, the conclusion remains the same: the dream has changed.{user_nick}, it's amazing you were able to find out about the changes we might have missed. Hmm, is it because you've been to many other worlds?

${user_nick}$
I don't know about that, but I fell from the Silver Dragon's Forcefield to the Goddess's dream, no, her dream within a dream.
(Tell Shea about the dream within a dream, Old Saint Haven and what you heard from the people gathered there.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The depths? Is that... like Mobius World?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
A dream within a dream… You went into the most dangerous place of all. Didn't Velskud explain that to you? It is a place akin to Hades. Dreams that have broken away from our reality sometimes descend into the depths.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(This is a bit too complex for me.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Oh, you know about that. Mobius World was almost completely devoured by the maze, but there still remain similar places that weren't. Sometimes they come back... No one knows where those dreams ultimately go. Some say they reenter the Goddess's consciousness and some say they simply disappear forever…

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
You think it's too complicated, don't you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(So... is that why Velskud got angry? Was he worried about me?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
To cut to the chase, the people who get caught up in those dreams usually don't come back. That's how dangerous they are.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I also don't think it was random.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
It's very strange. It can't be a coincidence that the Goddess gathered people in her deepest dreams.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(This needs to be reported to the palace.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
The Goddess must have protected you, considering you came back safely. May your journey continue to be blessed by the Goddess, {user_nick}...

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
The Goddess must have protected you, considering you came back safely. May your journey continue to be blessed by the Goddess, {user_nick}...

$King Cassius$
Ah, my kind subject, {user_class} {user_nick}. You have returned. S... speak about what you have learned.

${user_nick}$
Saint Haven really has changed! It's just that no one else has noticed! The Goddess's dream has fluctuated!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes, you are right, Your Majesty. People who say otherwise are wrong.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
That's... what happened? I... I knew I was right.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The problem is that to this point very few people have noticed.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
What? What are you talking about? Just how has Saint Haven changed?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Everyone seems to find it hard to accept.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Palace Sorceress Kallaen$
What? Are you saying the city has changed without me knowing? What the heck are you talking about, {user_nick}? You've made many contributions to our kingdom, but it's very hard to accept this theory.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm just telling you what I saw. His Majesty knows!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Terrence Terramai$
{user_nick}, you're not the type to exaggerate, but... Either you are misunderstanding what you are seeing, or you are simply mistaken. Don't you think?

$King Cassius$
(King Cassius looks around carefully and takes a deep breath, as if making up his mind.)
I... I am of the s-same opinion. Because I saw it too.

$King Cassius$
Uncle, it's...! I… I'm just saying… that I saw it...
(Cassius looks your way with a nervous expression.)

$King Cassius$
I... I can't say… I didn't see… what I saw... can I?!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Kallaen seems to have something to say.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
Your Majesty….

$Palace Sorceress Kallaen$
Goodness, Duke Stuart. Even if it is beyond our comprehension, we cannot deny it if the king has seen something.

$Terrence Terramai$
That's true. If it were someone suspicious I would understand your attitude, but {user_nick} here has never said anything harmful to the king.

$Duke Stuart$
W… well… It's not that I'm saying {user_nick} represents a danger to His Majesty… It's just that he's talking nonsense.

$Palace Sorceress Kallaen$
Duke Stuart. Surely you wouldn't dare suggest that His Majesty's is being absurd?

$Duke Stuart$
N-no, that's not it! I'm worried the people will be frightened.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Terramai looks in the direction of the king.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Terrence Terramai$
Talk of the Goddess's dream is certainly frightening. So, after hearing it out, Your Majesty, it might be best not to delve too much further into the matter. Don't you agree?

$King Cassius$
You're right... I don't want the people to be nervous... But is this country really safe? I... I'm worried.

${user_nick}$
Don't worry, Your Majesty. Everyone's fine, and there's no problem with the barrier. Most of all, the Goddess is not going to hurt us.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(I'm glad he's relieved one way or another.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
(Cassius's face brightens noticeably.)
Yes... yes, I see. If everyone's safe, then that's enough... for me. That's good enough. I guess the Goddess did it... for a reason.

$King Cassius$
You've resolved my curiosity… {user_nick}, you are a very good subject. You have carried out my orders and deserve to be rewarded.

$King Cassius$
A-and... the...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Of course! Then, I must go to Eltia!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
Th-thank you. For… believing me.
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: Everything According to the Goddess's Will Ⅰ
journal.contents:
Speak with Velskud.
You escaped the Old Saint Haven, the dream within a dream. Velskud is looking your way silently. Talk to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

Silver Dragon's Forcefield-Velskud

journal.title: Everything According to the Goddess's Will Ⅱ
journal.contents:
Speak with Priestess of Darkness Shea.
You have returned to Saint Haven. Priestess of Darkness Shea is waiting for you. Meet with her and hear about the Goddess's nightmare. Talk to Priestess of Darkness Shea.

Saint Haven-Priestess of Darkness Shea
journal.destination: Speak with Priestess of Darkness Shea
journal.todo_msg: Speak with Priestess of Darkness Shea.

journal.title: Everything According to the Goddess's Will Ⅲ
journal.contents:
Speak with King Cassius.
You have a general understanding of the situation. The time has come to inform King Cassius, who will be waiting for you in the palace. How you report the situation is up to you. Talk to King Cassius.

Saint Haven-King Cassius

journal.title: Everything According to the Goddess's Will Ⅳ
journal.contents:
Speak with King Cassius.
You have a general understanding of the situation. The time has come to inform King Cassius, who will be waiting for you in the palace. How you report the situation is up to you. Talk to King Cassius.

Saint Haven-King Cassius
